name: Orbit
natural_language_description: 这是 Orbit 节点。主要用于: Consume Orbit API

deprecated.displayName: Orbit has been shutdown and will no longer function from July 11th, You can read more here.
deprecated.name: deprecated
deprecated.natural_language_description: 参数名: Orbit has been shutdown and will no longer function from July 11th, You can read more here.

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: member

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many posts

workspaceId.name: workspaceId
workspaceId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
workspaceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workspace Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | 默认值: Deprecated | (必填项)

memberId.name: memberId
memberId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Member ID | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: memberId (值: None) - When set the post will be filtered by the member ID

resolveIdentities.name: resolveIdentities
resolveIdentities.description: By default, the response just includes the reference of the identity. When set to true the identities will be resolved automatically.
resolveIdentities.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Identities | 作用: By default, the response just includes the reference of the identity. When set to true the identities will be resolved automatically. | 默认值: False

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: sort (值: None) - Name of the field the response will be sorted by

source.name: source
source.description: Set to github, twitter, email, discourse or the source of any identities you've manually created
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source | 作用: Set to github, twitter, email, discourse or the source of any identities you've manually created | (必填项)

searchBy.name: searchBy
searchBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search By | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: ID | 作用: The username at the source | (必填项)

username.name: username
username.natural_language_description: 参数名: Username | 作用: The username at the source | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email address | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: tagsToAdd (值: None) - Adds tags to member; comma-separated string or array
tagList (值: None) - Replaces all tags for the member; comma-separated string or array

identityUi.name: identityUi
identityUi.description: The identity is used to find the member. If no member exists, a new member will be created and linked to the provided identity.
identityUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Identity | 作用: The identity is used to find the member. If no member exists, a new member will be created and linked to the provided identity. | 默认值: {}

resolveMember.name: resolveMember
resolveMember.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Member | 默认值: False

noteId.name: noteId
noteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Note ID | (必填项)

url.name: url
url.description: Supply any URL and Orbit will do its best job to parse out a title, description, and image
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: Supply any URL and Orbit will do its best job to parse out a title, description, and image | (必填项)

postId.name: postId
postId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Post ID | (必填项)
